```{r data-processing}
# Load the most recent grants CSV
# Define a known path using here::here() or fallback to getwd()
project_root <- tryCatch(
  here::here(),
  error = function(e) getwd()
)

# Explicitly define the expected CSV path
csv_path <- file.path(project_root, "GMRI_Grants.csv")

# Check existence before reading
if (!file.exists(csv_path)) {
  stop("CSV file not found at expected location: ", csv_path)
}

# Read the file
grants <- readr::read_csv(csv_path)

grants <- grants %>%
  filter(is.na(Deadline) | as.Date(Deadline) >= Sys.Date())

# Create the formatted table

# Build your table data
grants_out <- grants %>%
  mutate(
    Title = paste0(
      "<a href='", AdditionalInfoURL, "' style='color:#0047AB;'>", Title, "</a>"
    ),
    Deadline = as.Date(Deadline),
    Posted = as.Date(Posted),
    IsNew = Posted >= Sys.Date() - 7,  # TRUE/FALSE
    New = if_else(IsNew, "<span style='color:green;font-size:1.2em;'>&#x25CF;</span>", ""),
    
    # Helper columns for sorting
    Posted_for_sort = if_else(IsNew, Posted, as.Date(NA)),
    Deadline_for_sort = if_else(!IsNew, Deadline, as.Date(NA))
  ) %>%
  arrange(
    desc(IsNew),
    desc(Posted_for_sort),
    Deadline_for_sort
  )

new_indices <- which(grants_out$IsNew)

if (length(new_indices) == 0) {
  break_index <- 1  # no new rows, so break at 1 (or whatever logic you want)
} else {
  break_index <- max(new_indices) + 1
}
# Format date columns
grants_out <- grants_out %>%
  mutate(
    Deadline = format(Deadline, "%b %d, %Y"),
    Posted = format(Posted, "%b %d, %Y")
  ) %>%
  select(Agency, Title, New, Deadline, Posted)

# Insert break row if needed
break_row <- tibble(
  Agency = "&nbsp;",
  Title = "&nbsp;",
  New = "&nbsp;",
  Deadline = "&nbsp;",
  Posted = "&nbsp;"
)

# Add "No new" row if no new grants
if (length(new_indices) == 0) {
  no_new_row <- tibble(
    Agency = "",
    Title = "<strong>ðŸ“­ No new funding opportunities since the last update.</strong>",
    New = "",
    Deadline = "",
    Posted = ""
  )

  grants_out <- bind_rows(
    no_new_row,
    break_row,
    grants_out
  )
} else {
  grants_out <- bind_rows(
    grants_out[1:(break_index - 1), ],
    break_row,
    grants_out[break_index:nrow(grants_out), ]
  )
}
```

```{r table-output, include=TRUE, results="asis"}
fmt <- knitr::opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to")
tbl_format <- ifelse(fmt == "html", "html", "latex")

kable(grants_out, format = tbl_format, escape = FALSE) %>%
  kable_styling(
    bootstrap_options = if (tbl_format == "html") "striped" else NULL,
    latex_options = if (tbl_format == "latex") c("striped", "hold_position") else NULL,
    full_width = FALSE
  ) %>%
  row_spec(break_index, background = "#e0e0e0")
```
